headline: Is Cboe’s New Mixed Shelf and 2026 Dividend Altering The Investment Case For Cboe Global Markets (CBOE)?
summary: Cboe Global Markets recently filed an omnibus mixed shelf registration covering common and preferred stock, debt securities, warrants, subscription rights, depositary shares, purchase contracts and units, and earlier this month its board declared a first-quarter 2026 cash dividend of US$0.72 per share, payable on March 13 to holders of record on February 27. By securing broad financing flexibility while affirming its regular dividend, Cboe signals both capacity to fund future initiatives and...
